text: In her first segment of #TheReidOut, Joy Reid welcomed Joe Biden for an interview that touched on everything from President Trump’s response to the coronavirus pandemic to his own complicated history on criminal justice reform https://t.co/i0G88UcgjK

name: thedailybeast
text:
Matt Schlapp went after Joe Biden on Fox News, saying “he did an interview with a rap star and he couldn’t even get through that without a big foible on the ‘You ain’t black.'” 

Only thing is, Charlamagne Tha God isn't a “rap star.”  https://t.co/Zau6Ta7Bon
